hero.name: Medeiros
hero.small_about: Passionate about bringing creative ideas to life and tackling problems that will push my knowledge and skills further.

about.p1: I'm a passionate full stack web developer based in Brazil, interested in bringing creative and unique projects to life with the skills I'm quickly developing.
about.p2: Doesn't matter the difficulty: I'll take it. I love the thrill of the possibility of learning and improving my knowledge.
about.p3: I'm also a writer and an avid enjoyer of 80s "so bad, it's good" fantasy/sci-fi movies.
